function EP02_20()
    --.転-2【6月第1週】「皆さんが望むモノのため」
    SaveData.Title = "皆さんが望むモノのため"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    MSG([[When I reported the secret filming incident, Akira, visibly angered, made a terrifying suggestion.]])
    --//BU：アキラ（通常・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0221.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "If it were me, I'd strike back. It's obvious that Lira Hoozuki is involved in this incident, right?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0222.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smirk・Loungewear "We'd film Lira's tyrannical behavior at school, then upload it to a video site titled something like, '【WARNING】Everyone shocked by the dark side of the charismatic high school girl!'"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0223.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smirk・Loungewear "After that, we'd just wait for the justice warriors on the internet to go wild. Easy, right?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0335.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised・Casual "Y-You shouldn't say things like that, even jokingly. Revenge only makes both sides feel bad."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0224.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Serious・Loungewear "But... these kinds of harassment only escalate if you stay silent. Minato, you know that well, don’t you?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0336.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sad・Casual "...Yeah. That's true."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Akira and I both know well from our own experiences of being bullied that silence solves nothing.]])

    MSG([[If it weren't for my sister Marika, we might still be suffering now.]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0225.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Serious・Loungewear "They say revenge achieves nothing, but I disagree. In this era, 'silence achieves nothing.'"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0226.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Serious・Loungewear "There are so many tools to raise your voice nowadays, you should make full use of them."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0227.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Serious・Loungewear "Minato, you're too kind... I like that about you, but I'm worried your heart might wear down."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0337.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile・Casual "...Thank you. I love how you're always so worried about me, Akira."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0228.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Blush・Loungewear "Ugh..."]])

    MSG([[I don’t want to seek revenge or retaliation. But like Akira said, staying quiet won’t improve the situation.]])

    MSG([[We have to do something—]])


    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav")

    MSG([[After class, when I talked with the boys’ group, each of them reacted differently.]])
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0026.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "E-Erika-dono’s changing was secretly filmed? That’s unforgivableーーーーーーーー!!!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0016.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "We’ll help search for the culprit. If you don’t mind, could we see those photos as a reference? Where are they now?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0014.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Normal "Heh heh heh... I've already saved the data on my phone."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0027.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Excited "Amazing! As expected of #3!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0017.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Excited "Well done!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0096.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "No credit to anyone. Delete it immediately, you fools."]])

    MSG([[Ouga snatched the phone from #3 Senpai, deleted the photos swiftly, and tossed it outside the classroom.]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0003")
    MSG([[ 【Seniors】 "Hogeee?!?!?!?!"]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,900,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[Watching the seniors rush out of the classroom, we continued our conversation.]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0097.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "But Erika had a tough break. It’s no wonder Minato’s face looks so bad."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0338.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "...Thanks."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Because I’m the victim myself. Honestly, since this morning I haven’t been able to shake off the headache and stomach ache.]])

    MSG([[When I said I’d attend the boys’ division as usual, Akira scolded me seriously.]])

    MSG([[But I want to keep my daily life steady especially in tough times.]])

    MSG([[Otherwise, just like when my sister collapsed, it might drag on and affect the rest of my life.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0339.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "Ouga, what would you do if you were in Erika’s situation? She doesn’t want revenge or to hunt the culprit."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0098.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Me? That’s obvious."]])

    MSG([[Ouga opened his shirt and said loudly with a big laugh.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ce")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,400,-200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0099.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "I’d just show off my own presence! Haaaarrr ha ha ha ha!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0340.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "S-Show your existence?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0100.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "Listen, Minato! In this world, no one understands your own existence except yourself!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0101.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "So, it’s not unusual for cheap fake images to spread through rumors!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0102.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "But those are just illusions! If you show a powerful real self like me, you can easily overwrite them! Like twisting a baby’s hand!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0103.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Smile "If Erika stays true to herself, those false images will vanish quickly... kukuku!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[That was a typically confident answer from Ouga. Indeed, if a false image spreads, presenting the true image might be the only way to overwrite it.]])

    MSG([[But the problem this time is that the image that spread is actually the true self, and the everyday 'Erika Ikusa' is the false image.]])

    MSG([[—Overwriting the real self with a false image. Can I really do something like that?]])

    MSG([[If only I had the confidence like Ouga, I could stand tall and not be defeated by rumors. I really hate how cowardly I am.]])

    --//BU：先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0028.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "Minato-dono, I apologize for losing control earlier."]])

    MSG([[Before I knew it, the seniors had returned to the classroom. They spoke to me calmly, as if admonishing me gently.]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0029.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "If you ever struggle with anything about Erika-dono, don’t keep it to yourself. You can always talk to us."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0018.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "If there’s anything we can help with, we’ll always back you up."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0015.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Normal "Even though I look like this... I’m still a senior... heh heh."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0364.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "Everyone."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I felt the weight on my shoulders lighten a bit.]])

    MSG([[That’s right. It’s not just Akira and the knights. The boys’ division is also on Erika Ikusa’s side.]])

    MSG([[I still don’t have an answer on what to do—but I’ll do my best anyway.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0341.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "Thank you. I’ll ask for your help again if I need it."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0030.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Excited "You’re very welcome!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0019.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Excited "That’s right! We’re comrades! Always friends!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0016.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Excited "So, about those photos of Erika-chan, you know..."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0342.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "No."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0003")
    MSG([[ 【Seniors】Anxious "Hogeeeeee?!"]])

    MSG([[After chatting for a while, the day ended when the security guard arrived and dismissed the boys’ division as usual.]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask003" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[After parting with everyone, I wandered around the school for no particular reason.]])

    MSG([[It was past the time the guard would have scolded me if he found me, but my chest felt restless and I didn’t want to go home yet.]])

    MSG([[How should I behave from now on as Erika Ikusa?]])

    MSG([[I had a feeling that if I walked around the school a little more, I might find the answer.]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM99_Acapella.wav")

    MSG([[ 【????】 "~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"]])
    --//エルメス
    --//注釈：ＯＰをアカペラで歌ってもらいたい。

    MSG([[I heard singing from somewhere and stopped walking.]])

    MSG([[Singing inside the school at this hour? Who could it be? And why?]])

    MSG([[Looking around anxiously, I noticed a figure swaying at the center of the sports ground.]])

    MSG([[I approached the figure, realized who it was, and was shocked.]])

    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0343.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "Himegami, Hermes-san...?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[The national idol and leader of the "<r=しき>Four Princesses</r>". The woman with the strongest power at this academy—Hermes Himegami—was dancing and swaying as she sang.]])

STOP_BGM()

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0037.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "Hmm? Oh? Could it be you—"]])

    MSG([[She approached me, frozen with surprise, then suddenly jumped at me.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --//CG：エルメスハグ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV012ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)
    PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0038.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】 "Minachaaan!!! Yay! I’ve been wanting to see you forever～～<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0344.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】 "M-me!? W-why!?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0039.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】 "Because you stopped Eugene-san at the entrance ceremony as Erika-chan’s cousin! And you’re also Marika-chan’s little brother! Of course I wanted to meet you～～!"]])

    MSG([[Even so, suddenly hugging me! Oh wow... her body is unbelievably soft, and she smells so nice.]])

    MSG([[Soft. Fluffy. Soft. Fluffy. This is what an idol is like...]])

    --//BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0345.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "Ah!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0346.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious (Stop, stop. I have to stay sane! This is a big chance to ask about my sister Marika!)]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I forced myself to calm down and decided to make the most of this unexpected opportunity.]])

    MSG([[If it’s Hermes, the leader of the princes, she must know something about Marika.]])

    MSG([[Hermes seems kind, so maybe she’ll tell me the answer. I have to take this chance!]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0347.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "Um, Hermes-san! Sorry to be rude! What kind of relationship did you have with my sister, Marika Ikusa?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I stepped away and asked. Hermes tilted her head, looking puzzled.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0040.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "We were really good friends. Why? Is there something you’re curious about?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0348.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "Uh, no... I’m just wondering how Marika-nee was at school."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0349.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "Like, was she so troubled she collapsed?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[It was a bold question. Her reaction might give me a clue if she knows something!]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0041.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "Hmm! I’ve heard from Daria-chan that Marika-chan was worried about something～"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0042.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Sad "I’m not often at school, so I don’t know the details— I’m really sorry."]])

    MSG([[That was a blow. But of course that’s understandable.]])

    MSG([[Even now, Hermes is treated specially and only attends between work.]])

    MSG([[Just the announcement of her school days causes a big fuss.]])

    MSG([[It makes sense she wouldn’t know Marika’s circumstances well.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0350.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sad "Y-Yeah... but then, why are you here at school at such a late hour?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0043.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Shhh, don’t tell anyone, okay? I love Yuriai Private Academy<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0044.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "Since I was born, my mom told me about this school, and I always wanted to come here."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0351.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "Since you were born?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I refrained from the rude question about memories from that age.]])

    MSG([[Anyway, it’s clear Yuriai Private Academy is a place deeply meaningful to Hermes.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0045.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Wry smile "But since I have to work as an idol, sometimes after work I sneak in for walks like this."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0046.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "Breathing in lots of Yuriai Academy’s air makes me want to do my best tomorrow and brings smiles!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0047.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "The secret to Idol Hermes Himegami’s energy is—none other than the air of Yuriai Academy! Just kidding! Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

    MSG([[It didn’t seem like an act at all.]])

    MSG([[Meeting me must have been completely unexpected. Yet the Hermes before me was exactly as I saw her on TV and at the entrance ceremony as the '<r=アイドル>Princess</r>'.]])

    MSG([[As if behaving as the '<r=アイドル>ideal image</r>' was completely natural.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0352.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile・Sweat (This probably means it’s no use asking about my sister.)]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0353.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal (This cheerful person couldn’t possibly have driven Marika-nee to despair.)]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[For now, I just wanted to learn more about Hermes in front of me. I decided not to pry rudely and just accompany her on her night walk while I could.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：メインストリート（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0048.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "Neko<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Koneko<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Nyan nyan nyan～<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Neko<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Koneko<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Nyan nyan nyan～<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"]])
    --//注釈：『ボギー大佐』の替え歌。『サル・ゴリラ・チンパンジー』のリズムで。

    MSG([[Hermes walked around the campus singing and looked genuinely happy. She showed no signs of stress or fatigue as an idol.]])

    MSG([[I honestly wondered how I could become strong like her.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0354.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "Hermes-san, when an image spread that’s different from your true self as an idol, what do you do?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0355.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "For example, if weird scandalous photos spread..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0049.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Surprised "Eh?! Hmm... I wonder..."]])

    MSG([[Hermes stopped walking, crossed her arms, and began to seriously think.]])

    MSG([[As an idol, she’s probably dealt with scandals every day.]])

    MSG([[I just wanted to know how she would handle a situation like mine.]])

    MSG([[But her answer surprised me—]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0050.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "On the contrary, Minato, what kind of image do you want others to have of you?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0356.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "M-me!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[I didn’t expect to be asked.]])

    MSG([[What about me? I want to be manly, but I don’t want to impose that image on others.]])

    MSG([[For example, if Akira thinks of me as a kind older brother, I want to do my best to live up to that image.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0357.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "I’d be happiest if everyone could freely have whatever image they want of me."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0051.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "Amazing! I feel the same way!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0052.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "I also want everyone to freely hold the image of the 'Hermes Himegami' they love most<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0053.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "If a wrong image spreads because of a scandal, it means they didn’t really hold that image in the first place, right?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0054.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "Cats don’t spread videos of themselves scratching, but if they walked on two legs, they would, right?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0055.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Normal "It’s the same with people—because it’s different from the image, it spreads. But the truth is everyone wants to see the cute side scratching."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0056.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smile "Then it’s simple<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Show everyone the image they want! The favorite 'Hermes Himegami' everyone loves, and they’ll be happy<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0057.wav")
